summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5280 for the improvement of West Hudson Street, from Erskine Way to California Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and side sewers with the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 61054, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
